mapper.select: SELECT UR.USER_RESUME_IDX , UR.USER_TITLE , UR.USER_RESUME_REGDATE FROM USER_RESUME UR LEFT JOIN USERS ON UR.USER_ID = USERS.USER_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID=#{ user_id } ORDER BY USER_RESUME_IDX DESC
SELECT USER_RESUME_IDX FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_ID = #{ user_id } ORDER BY USER_RESUME_IDX DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT UR.USER_RESUME_IDX , UR.USER_TITLE , UR.USER_ID , UR.USER_NAME , UR.USER_BIRTH , UR.USER_PHONE , UR.USER_EMAIL , UR.REGION_IDX , UR.REGION_ADDRESS , UR.USER_INTRO , UR.USER_RESUME_REGDATE FROM USER_RESUME UR LEFT JOIN COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL CURS ON UR.USER_RESUME_IDX = CURS.USER_RESUME_IDX WHERE UR.USER_RESUME_IDX = ${user_resume_idx} GROUP BY UR.USER_RESUME_IDX , UR.USER_TITLE , UR.USER_ID , UR.USER_NAME , UR.USER_BIRTH , UR.USER_PHONE , UR.USER_EMAIL , UR.REGION_IDX , UR.REGION_ADDRESS , UR.USER_INTRO , UR.USER_RESUME_REGDATE
SELECT SKILLS.SKILL_NAME, SKILLS.SKILL_STACK FROM COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL CURS JOIN SKILLS ON CURS.SKILL_NAME = SKILLS.SKILL_NAME WHERE CURS.USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMON_USER_RESUME_SKILL WHERE USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx }
DELETE FROM USER_RESUME WHERE USER_RESUME_IDX = #{ user_resume_idx }
